comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Could be Everett P. Fowler, From NYT of Nov 18, 1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9B04E6D71E3BE633A... "Everett P. Fowler of Kingston, indicted on a charge of extorting $250 from Seneca P. Hull, a State road contractor of Cortland, decided yesterday that he would stand trial on the charge."

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Zigpha, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 35122993@N08
comment._content: Swanq: I think you're right. Another photo in P&P files has same identification. I'll have both records updated. Thanks to you and Wystan.

comment._content: www.co.ulster.ny.us/archives/exhibits/BarAssoc/pages/039-... could be the same guy, without moustache. The nose has the same shape. Kingston (see note above) is in Ulster County, NY.
